person.persName: Benjamin F. Lewis (Hancock County, Kentucky, soldier - 2nd Lt. 11th Ky. Cav.)

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Abel Lewis and Frances Lewis. Attended school in Hancock County, Kentucky, in 1850. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private, first sergeant, and second lieutenant from October 3, 1863 to October 25, 1864. Served in the 12th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a second lieutenant from October 25, 1864 to August 23, 1865.
